name: Missive Windspear
description: A beacon that shows the direction of the wind. Not every idyll carried on the breeze remains a gentle thing...

passiveDescription.0: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>12%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>48</cryo>.
passiveDescription.1: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>15%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>60</cryo>.
passiveDescription.2: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>18%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>72</cryo>.
passiveDescription.3: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>21%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>84</cryo>.
passiveDescription.4: Within 10s after an Elemental Reaction is triggered, ATK is increased by <cryo>24%</cryo> and Elemental Mastery is increased by <cryo>96</cryo>.
